org.waarp.gateway.kernel.http

Class HttpWriteCacheEnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.gateway.kernel.http.HttpWriteCacheEnable

  • public final class HttpWriteCacheEnable
extends Object
    Utility class to write external file with cache enable properties

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TimeZone GMT_ZONE
      GMT timezone - all HTTP dates are on GMT

      US locale - all HTTP dates are in english

      format for RFC 1123 date string -- "Sun, 06 Nov 1994 08:49:37 GMT"
